en.Neue Vorlesungsaufzeichnung \"%s\" im K: New lecture recording "%s" in course "% s"
en.Mit diesem Tool können Videos aus dem Vo: With this tool, videos from the lecture recording system (Opencast) can be linked to a Stud.IP course. The  recordings are made available in an embedded player in Stud.IP. In addition, with this integration it is possible to schedule the entire recording for a course. The prerequisite for this are the corresponding entries in the schedule and a booked  resource with an Opencast capture agent. Existing media can be  can be added to the linked series via the upload function to the linked series.
